["$r",null,null,{"children":[["$r","p",null,{"children":"Debian 第三方多媒体软件源"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["该项目以前的名字为 Debian Multimedia，现改名为 Deb Multimedia。注意这不是 Debian 官方项目，
是为 deb-multimedia.org 的镜像，与 Debian 官方的 Multimedia 小组的区别见
",["$r","a",null,{"href":"https://wiki.debian.org/DebianMultimedia/FAQ","rel":"nofollow","children":"https://wiki.debian.org/DebianMultimedia/FAQ"}]]}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["在 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"/etc/apt/sources.list"}]," 中加入"]}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"menus":[{"title":"Debian 版本","items":[["Debian 13 (trixie)",{"release_name":"trixie","has_backports":"# "}],["Debian 12 (bookworm)",{"release_name":"bookworm","has_backports":"# "}],["Debian 11 (bullseye)",{"release_name":"bullseye","has_backports":""}],["sid",{"release_name":"sid","has_backports":"# "}],["testing",{"release_name":"testing","has_backports":"# "}]]},{"title":"启用源码镜像","items":[["否",{"enable_source":"# "}],["是",{"enable_source":""}]]}],"code":"deb {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/ {{release_name}} main non-free
{{enable_source}}deb-src {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/ {{release_name}} main non-free
{{has_backports}}deb {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/ {{release_name}}-backports main
{{has_backports}}{{enable_source}}deb-src {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/ {{release_name}}-backports main","codeLanguage":"properties"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":["更改完 ",["$r","code",null,{"children":"sources.list"}]," 文件后请导入 deb-multimedia-keyring"]}],"
",["$r","CodeBlock",null,{"code":"wget {{http_protocol}}{{mirror}}/pool/main/d/deb-multimedia-keyring/deb-multimedia-keyring_2024.9.1_all.deb
{{sudo}}dpkg -i deb-multimedia-keyring_2024.9.1_all.deb
{{sudo}}apt-get update","codeLanguage":"bash"}],"
",["$r","p",null,{"children":"然后更新索引以生效。"}]]}]

meta.title: Deb Multimedia 软件仓库镜像使用帮助
